page.title: 11 WHITLEY BAY CEMETERY
page.content: Whitley Bay's cemetery and crematorium are situated on the north side of Whitley Bay. The 3 hectare site was previously farmland and the cemetery was built in 1913 and opened in April of the same year. The first burial took place on the 14th of September 1913 and the first cremation was on the 4th of March, 1960.There have been 11,821 burials and 15,994 cremations at the site. 70% of people now prefer cremation, leaving 30% prefering burial. Cremations cost about 70.50 pounds. Burials are more expensive- 63.00 pounds for ground and 320-360 pounds for gravestones. The service is 67.40 pounds.
